purpose: To provide a centralized repository of resources, research updates, and practical tools related to generative AI
principle: Aggregates and curates a wide range of generative AI resources including research papers, tutorials, and Jupyter notebooks
reusability: Offers a collection of resources and links that can be easily accessed and utilized by researchers, students, and professionals interested in generative AI
limitations: Primarily serves as a resource aggregation; does not include original software tools or applications
name: awesome-generative-ai-guide
description: A one stop repository for generative AI research updates, interview resources, notebooks and much more!
highlight: Comprehensive resource for generative AI research and practical applications
